lead_paragraph: An Iranian airline blacklisted under United States sanctions has bought nine used Airbus passenger planes for an undisclosed amount from unidentified sellers.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Blacklisted Airline Buys Planes

snippet: An Iranian airline blacklisted under United States sanctions has bought nine used Airbus passenger planes for an undisclosed amount from unidentified sellers.
abstract: Iranian airline Mahan Air is reported to have bought nine used Airbus passenger planes from unidentified seller; purchase could complicate negotiations over country's nuclear program as airline is on Treasury Dept sanctions list for supporting Revolutionary Guards Quds Force and Hezbollah militants.
